amount.food: 6 ripe tomatoes (about 3 lbs), peeled and chopped (yielding about 6 cups)
1 sweet red bell pepper (or green) seeded and chopped (about 1 cup)

receipe.teaspoon: 1 clove garlic, minced (about 1 teaspoon) 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce (omit for vegetarian option) 2 teaspoons sugar (more may be needed to balance out the acidity of the tomatoes, add to taste)
receipe.seasoning: Salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
6 or more drops of Tabasco sauce to taste

amount.food: 2 cups tomato juice (or 1 15-ounce can crushed tomatoes if you don't have tomato juice)
